description: ArticleScores metric.json schema. A metric's json definition, along with all supporting files (internationalization messages, images, etc.) must be contained in a subdirectory of the "metrics" directory of the ArticleScores extension. The name of this subdirectory defines the case-sensitive id of the metric. For consistency, many fields use the same names as the extension.json schema. However, only a limited subset of these fields are supported for metrics.

id.description: The id of the metric. This must be unique across all registered metrics. If not specified, will default to the class name (without the namespace).

class.description: The full class name (including namespace) of the metric

classfile.description: The relative path to the metric class php file. If not specified, will default to the class name (without the namespace) in the same directory as the json definition.

version.description: The version of this release of the metric.

name.description: Raw display name of the metric. If not specified, this will default to the metric's id.

namemsg.description: i18n message key of the metric's name. If not specified, will attempt to use the message key "articlescores-METRICID-name". If a valid message is defined, this will take precedence over the value of "name".

descriptionmsg.description: i18n message key of the metric's description. If not specified, will attempt to use the message key "articlesores-METRICID-desc". If a valid message is defined, this will take precedence over the value of "description".

config.description: Configuration options for this metric. Unlike the extension.json definition of this field, this should be a simple object with the variable names as properties and default values as values.

AutoloadClasses.description: Classes and their files to autoload. This should be a simple object with the class name as properties and the local path to the class files function as values.

AvailableRights.description: User rights added by the class.

GroupPermissions.description: Default permissions to give to usergroup. This should be a two dimensional object with the usergroup as the first dimension's properties, the rights as the second dimension, and a boolean to grant or deny the right as values.

Hooks.description: MediaWiki hooks. This should be a simple object with the hook as properties and the callback function as values.

MessagesDirs.description: Directory paths containing JSON internationalization data. Unlike the extension.json definition of this field, this should be a simple array of paths relative to the metric's root.
